sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of travel outcome occurring on a trip
message_1: A student plans to take a train from City A to City B. The probability that the train will arrive on time is 0.75. If the train is on time, the probability that the student will reach his destination on the same day is 0.90. What is the probability that the student will reach his destination on the same day, given that the train arrived on time?
message_2: Given that the train arrived on time, the probability that the student will reach his destination on the same day is 0.90.
